name: Possess
description:
An extremely short 3D puzzle platformer made for Wowie Jam 3.0 where failure is progress.

You are a ghost who has been trapped in a containment facility. You must possess the humans to work your way through a maze of energy fields, glass and spikes.

- WASD to move
- Space to jump
- LMB to possess hosts

EDIT: The mouse sensitivity seems to be really high on the web version for some reason. If that's bothering you, use the downloadable version.
